    • percentage

      public static double percentage(Number part, Number total)
      Build double percentage value of part from total.

      Avoids divide by zero exception.

      Parameter:
      part - absolute value of part
      total - part absolute value of total
      Gibt zurück:
      percentage value of part of total (may be > 100 or < 0) or 0 if total is 0

      total - part absolute value of total
      Gibt zurück:
      rounded integer percentage value of part of total (may be > 100 or < 0) or 0 if total is 0

    • formatDouble

      public static String formatDouble(Double d, int maxPrecision, String decimalSeparatorOrNull)
      Format double value with maximum precision and eventually given decimal separator.
      Parameter:
      d - double value to format
      maxPrecision - maximum precision
      decimalSeparatorOrNull - "." or "," to explicitly define decimal separator or null to use locale-specific separator
      Gibt zurück:
      double value formatted as string
